listData.name: EMONEY HOME LOAN INVESTMENT
listData.description: Suitable for investment borrowing with Fixed and variable options.

features.additionalInfo: Loan terms up to 30yrs available. Up to 40yrs for applications under 80%
Extra repayments. Capped at $10k per year on fixed rates
Interest Only options available up to 5yrs at a time.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Must be an Australian citizen or permanent resident, with an Australian residential address
Only available for business introduced through eMoney Home Loans.
Meet SCCU assessment criteria and demonstrate capacity to repay the loan
Provide acceptable residential mortgege security which must be insured with SCCU noted as an interested party

fees.name: HOME_LOAN_LEGAL_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: A one off fee required to document and settle your loan.

fees.name: HOME_LOAN_PRODUCT_SWITCH
fees.additionalInfo: Variations to your loan including changing product, fixing your interest rates or switching between interest only and principle and interest repayments, will incur a product switch fee.

fees.name: LOAN_TOP-UP
fees.additionalInfo: Additional establishment fee for increasing your VARIABLE rate home loan at any point after the home loan has been finalised. Does not include Fixed rate loans

fees.name: RECONTRACTING_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Any amendments made to the loan after the loan contract has been created but before it has been funded will incur a fee.

fees.name: DIRECT_DEBIT_DISHONOUR
fees.additionalInfo: Charged if your direct debit payment is dishonoured due to insufficient funds

fees.name: LOAN_DISCHARGE_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: This fee covers the costs associated with releasing your title and is charged per security discharged

fees.name: HOME_LOAN_ESTABLISHMENT_FEE_EMONEY
fees.additionalInfo: A one off upfront fee for setting up your home loan.

fees.name: AVM_VALUATION_FEE_EMONEY_$25
fees.additionalInfo: service that can provide real estate property valuations using mathematical modelling combined with a database.

fees.name: PROPERTY_VALUATON_FEE_EMONEY-VALUATION_FEE_$450
fees.additionalInfo: Standard property valuation fee when a Valuer physically attends the security property

fees.name: DESKTOP_VALUATION_FEE_EMONEY
fees.additionalInfo: automated computer valuation completed using property data, recent comparable sales and property listings

fees.name: CONSTRUCTION_LOAN_PROGRESS_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Applicable to construction loans  only when progressive payments are made to your builder.

fees.name: LEGAL_FEE_TRUST_DEED
fees.additionalInfo: A trust deed is reviewed if a trust entity is the borrower or guarantor of the loan

fees.name: LOAN_VARIATION
fees.additionalInfo: When there is a variation made to the terms of an existing loan agreement. For example principal reduction, change to loan term.

fees.name: HOME_LOAN_SECURITY_VARIATION
fees.additionalInfo: When there is a variation made to the security used for an existing loan agreement. Charged per security.

fees.name: SECURITY_GUARANTEE_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: If you require or elect to have a guarantor for your loan, this fee is charged to cover the additional administration costs. This fee is charged per guarantor.

fees.name: GUARANTOR_SECURITY_VARIATION
fees.additionalInfo: Changes to a guarantor security and removing guarantor(s) from a loan. Charged per security

fees.name: FIXED_RATE_LOCK_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: May be applicable on Fixed rate loan. 0.15% of loan amount or a mimimum of $750, charged per Fixed rate lock request

fees.name: REDRAW_IN_BRANCH
fees.additionalInfo: Charged if you access advance payment on your loan in-branch. Redraw available while on VARIABLE rates only

fees.name: BREAK_COST_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: May be applicable if a FIXED rate loan is paid out early or a variation is requested to break fixed rate term in favour of applying a variable rate

fees.name: LOAN_CONSOLIDATION
fees.additionalInfo: Applicable when one or more VARIABLE rate loans with SCCU are to be consolidated. Does not include Fixed rate loans.

fees.name: DEPOSIT_BOND_HANDLING
fees.additionalInfo: Fee charged to assist with the completion and submission of a Deposit Bond application

listData.name: LJH 5STAR HOME LOAN INVESTMENT
listData.description: Suitable for residential Investment borrowing from loan amounts over $100k. Fixed and variable options available.

features.additionalInfo: Terms up to 30yrs available. Up to 40yrs for applications under 80%
Extra Repayments. Capped at $10k per annum while rate fixed.
Interest Only options available up to 5yrs at a time.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Only available for business introduced through LJ Hooker Home Loans
Meets SCCU assessment criteria and demonstrates capacity demonstrated to repay loan
Must be an Australian citizen or permanent resident with an Australian residential address
Provide acceptable residential mortgage security which must be insured with SCCU noted as an interested party.

fees.name: HOME_LOAN_LEGAL_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: A one off fee required to document and settle your loan.

fees.name: RECONTRACTING_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Any amendments made to the loan after the loan contract has been created but before it has been funded will incur a fee.

fees.name: LOAN_DISCHARGE_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: This fee covers the costs associated with releasing your title and is charged per security discharged

fees.name: AVM_VALUATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: service that can provide real estate property valuations using mathematical modelling combined with a database.

fees.name: DESKTOP_VALUATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: automated computer valuation completed using property data, recent comparable sales and property listings

fees.name: BREAK_COST_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: May be applicable if a FIXED rate loan is paid out early or a variation is requested to break fixed rate term in favour of applying a variable rate

fees.name: FIXED_RATE_LOCK_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: May be applicable on Fixed rate loan. 0.15% of loan amount or a mimimum of $750, charged per Fixed rate lock request

fees.name: HOME_LOAN_PRODUCT_SWITCH
fees.additionalInfo: Variations to your loan including changing product, fixing your interest rates or switching between interest only and principle and interest repayments, will incur a product switch fee.

fees.name: HOME_LOAN_SECURITY_VARIATION
fees.additionalInfo: When there is a variation made to the security used for an existing loan agreement. Charged per security.

fees.name: LOAN_TOP-UP
fees.additionalInfo: Additional establishment fee for increasing your VARIABLE rate home loan at any point after the home loan has been finalised. Does not include Fixed rate loans

fees.name: GUARANTOR_SECURITY_VARIATION
fees.additionalInfo: Changes to a guarantor security and removing guarantor(s) from a loan. Charged per security

fees.name: SECURITY_GUARANTEE_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: If you require or elect to have a guarantor for your loan, this fee is charged to cover the additional administration costs. This fee is charged per guarantor.

fees.name: HOME_LOAN_TRUST_DEED_LEGAL_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: A trust deed is reviewed if a trust entity is the borrower or guarantor of the loan.

fees.name: CONSTRUCTION_LOAN_PROGRESS_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Applicable to construction loans  only when progressive payments are made to your builder.

fees.name: REDRAW_IN_BRANCH
fees.additionalInfo: Charged if you access advance payment on your loan in-branch. Redraw available while on VARIABLE rates only

fees.name: LOAN_CONSOLIDATION
fees.additionalInfo: Applicable when one or more VARIABLE rate loans with SCCU are to be consolidated. Does not include Fixed rate loans.

fees.name: LOAN_VARIATION
fees.additionalInfo: When there is a variation made to the terms of an existing loan agreement. For example principal reduction, change to loan term.

fees.name: PROPERTY_VALUATION_FEE_BROKER
fees.additionalInfo: If using a property as security for the loan, we need to confirm what the property is worth. This fee covers the cost of valuing your property which can vary depending on type and complexity of the property. Fee varies dependent on type and complexity of property. Minimum fee shown.
